body:
Hi sorry for the late reply.
I reproduced the issue, not sure when I will be able to fix though.

issue.title: ArgumentCaptor no longer working for varargs

repository.name: mockito
repository.description: Most popular Mocking framework for unit tests written in Java

issue.body: Fixes #188 . These commits should fix issue with capturing varargs.

issue.title: Fixes for issues #188, #211 not back-ported to Mockito 1.x

repository.name: mockito
repository.description: Most popular Mocking framework for unit tests written in Java

issue.body:
We still use Mockito 1.x because PowerMock only "experimentally" supports Mockito 2.x.

However, we can't upgrade from Mockito 1.9.5 to 1.10.x (any version of 1.10.x) because the bug described in #188 and fixed by #211, failure to capture arguments in mock varargs methods, was introduced in 1.10.5.

Would it be possible to back-port the fix introduced in #211 and release a version 1.10.20 with the fix?

Thanks.
